hasMenuItem.name: "Surprise Me" Cheesecake Special (limit 1 per order) (AS-IS item)
hasMenuItem.description: Don't know which cake to get? Why not letting us surprise you?  Sometimes there are cheesecakes missing a little tip, or cut into a slightly  smaller size, or even just because it is our last piece and we have to switch off the cake on Doordash before we oversell it.  So, if you like surprise, give it a try ;)

The burger features beef patty, cheese, onion rings, bacon, avocado, lettuce, & tomato on toasted bun with our housemade burger sauce.

IF CUSTOMER CHOOSES VEGETARIAN PATTY OPTION, WE WILL LEAVE OUT THE BACON BUT STILL INCLUDE CHEESE UNLESS SPECIFIED IN THE INSTRUCTION, THX!

hasMenuItem.name: Lobster Ravioli Combo (280g)
hasMenuItem.description: Lobster ravioli (280g) with soup, bread, & salad. Bread options: baguette, garlic toast (white/brown), croissant. Salad choices: potato, potato & egg, macaroni, spinach arugula, caesar.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Alfredo Combo (280g)
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken fettuccine Alfredo served with choice of garlic bread options: baguette, white, brown, or croissant. Includes soup, and selection of potato, macaroni, or leaf salads.

hasMenuItem.name: Meat Lasagna Combo (280g)
hasMenuItem.description: 280g meat lasagna served with a side soup, choice of garlic toasted baguette or croissant, and a variety of salads including potato, macaroni, spinach arugula, or classic caesar.

hasMenuItem.name: Roast Tomato Mac & Cheese Combo (280g)
hasMenuItem.description: Roast tomato mac & cheese served with choice of garlic bread variants or butter croissant, and a selection of potato-based or green salads.

review.reviewBody: This place is my absolute favorite to order from! Their food  is so delicious andtheir  menu is so versatile---I mean curly fries, bubble tea and cheesecake all in one place?! Yes please!
Everything was fresh, tasty and packaged very well.

I LOVE CHARISMA! The Chicken Noodle Soup and garlic baguette and ceaser ü•ó Classic Caesar Salad are my favourite! I have been ordering from them for years and they are always consistent, thoughtful and delicious!
Allan always goes above and beyond. He takes care of his customers and is always so friendly. I also love that there's so much effort going into the food, and it's always made fresh to order.

Mac and cheese is extremely extremely small for the price I pulled out container and actually laughed !!! this place is a total rip off... food isn't even good... 
ordered Chicken Dumplings (8pcs) in Chicken Broth üêî  and it was just gyoza In broth in a tiny container. will never order here again. save ur money for somewhere actually provides a proper service/meal  for ur buck. not comedy hour when u open the delivery bag ...
